verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite <WH7747>, and said <WH559>,
How long <WH5704> will ye hunt <WH7760> for <WH7078> words <WH4405>? Consider <WH995>, and afterwards <WH310> we will speak <WH1696>.
Wherefore are we counted <WH2803> as beasts <WH929>, And are become unclean <WH2933> in your sight <WH5869>?
Thou that tearest <WH2963> thyself <WH5315> in thine anger <WH639>, Shall the earth <WH776> be forsaken <WH5800> for thee <WH6697>? Or shall the rock be removed <WH6275> out of its place <WH4725>?
Yea <WH216>, the light of the wicked <WH7563> shall be put out <WH1846>, And the spark <WH7632> of his fire <WH784> shall not shine <WH5050>.
The light <WH216> shall be dark <WH2821> in his tent <WH168>, And his lamp <WH5216> above him shall be put out <WH1846>.
The steps <WH6806> of his strength <WH202> shall be straitened <WH3334>, And his own counsel <WH6098> shall cast him down <WH7993>.
For he is cast <WH7971> into a net <WH7568> by his own feet <WH7272>, And he walketh <WH1980> upon the toils <WH7639>.
A gin <WH6341> shall take <WH270> him by the heel <WH6119>, And a snare <WH6782> shall lay hold on him <WH2388>.
A noose <WH2256> is hid <WH2934> for him in the ground <WH776>, And a trap <WH4434> for him in the way <WH5410>.
Terrors <WH1091> shall make him afraid <WH1204> on every side <WH5439>, And shall chase <WH6327> him at his heels <WH7272>.
His strength <WH202> shall be hunger-bitten <WH7457>, And calamity <WH343> shall be ready <WH3559> at his side <WH6763>.
The members <WH905> of his body <WH5785> shall be devoured <WH398>, Yea <WH1060>, the first-born of death <WH4194> shall devour <WH398> his members <WH905>.
He shall be rooted out <WH5423> of his tent <WH168> where he trusteth <WH4009>; And he shall be brought <WH6805> to the king <WH4428> of terrors <WH1091>.
There shall dwell <WH7931> in his tent <WH168> that which is none <WH1097> of his <WH1614>: Brimstone shall be scattered <WH2219> upon his habitation <WH5116>.
His roots <WH8328> shall be dried up <WH3001> beneath <WH4605>, And above shall his branch <WH7105> be cut off <WH5243>.
His remembrance <WH2143> shall perish <WH6> from the earth <WH776>, And he shall have no name <WH8034> in the street <WH6440>.
He shall be driven <WH1920> from light <WH216> into darkness <WH2822>, And chased <WH5074> out of the world <WH8398>.
He shall have neither son <WH5209> nor son <WH5220>'s son among his people <WH5971>, Nor any remaining <WH8300> where he sojourned <WH4033>.
They that come after <WH314> shall be astonished <WH8074> at his day <WH3117>, As they that went before <WH6931> were affrighted <WH270>.
Surely such are the dwellings <WH4908> of the unrighteous <WH5767>, And this is the place <WH4725> of him that knoweth <WH3045> not God <WH410>.
